dcterms:creator: Iro Armeni
Sasha Sax
Amir R Zamir
Silvio Savarese
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 3D point clouds with color channels, collected at 6 areas in 3 different buildings with 13 class labels. Each point cloud contains 4,096 points, and each point has 9 features.
dcterms:title: S3DIS

dcterms:creator: Timo Hackel
Nikolay Savinov
Lubor Ladicky
Jan D Wegner
Konrad Schindler
Marc Pollefeys
dcterms:description: A large-scale point cloud classification benchmark collected using high-resolution cameras and survey-grade laser scanners, containing over 108 points per point cloud and 8 classes.
dcterms:title: Semantic3D

dcterms:creator: Qiangeng Xu
Xudong Sun
Cho-Ying Wu
Panqu Wang
Ulrich Neumann
dcterms:description: A dataset designed for fast and scalable point cloud learning, containing 9 features per point.
dcterms:title: S3IDS
